commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Good job today. You were a wonderful model out there today.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Really? Did I actually pull it off?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed, you were very impressive.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: At the very least, you were fresher than Nico out there.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Well, I do bank on my mature charms.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Mature charms?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What, you got a problem?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: N-Nah.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: *Giggle* I will have to buy this magazine when it's released. Quite a few--in fact, I must pass it out in the neighborhood.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Th-That's really embarrassing, but I'm glad to hear you say it.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: So far, so good. I hope Kasumi does well, too.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hmph, I wonder how far she can go.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh, there she is!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So, bringing me in for the big finish. Excellent taste! Now, take me from any angle--all sides are my good side! How about here? Here?!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Kasumi sure is cute, isn't she?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Mmm, her outfit looks perfect on her. Yet, something seems.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I can even pull this off! Like this! Or this!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: She gonna be all right? Like, twirling around in a kimono like that?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eeps!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ahh, she tripped on her sleeve.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: A-Are you all right? You're not hurt anywhere, are you?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: U-Urgh.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You must pull it together, Kasumi. You're the representative for Nijigasaki High School!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nijigasaki's representative? Me?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That's right. If you don't go out there for your school, who will?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm the representative...because I'm the cutest!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Huh? Uh, er, sure, do your best.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Heh, it's going to take a lot more than a little trip to stop me! Now, keep those pictures coming!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: She sure is easy to turn.
